mapper.select: select user_no as userNo, book_name as bookName, book_kind as bookKind, book_writer as bookWriter, book_publisher as bookPublisher, book_introduce as bookIntroduce, isbn, imageurl, reason, isproposal from (select rownum as pNum, p.* from (select * from book_proposal order by isproposal nulls first )p) where pNum between ${start} and ${end}
mapper.update: update book_proposal set isproposal = 'y' where isbn = #{ISBN}
update book_proposal set isproposal = 'n' where isbn = #{ISBN}
